titles.title: A bill to provide that a special gold medal be presented to Mary Lasker for her humanitarian contributions in the area of medical research and education, urban beautification and fine arts, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 10/28/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to present a gold medal to Mary Lasker in recognition of her humanitarian contributions in medical research and education, urban beautification, and the fine arts. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the sale of bronze duplicates of the medal.
